meanings.definition: The quality or state of being lively and cheerful.
meanings.sent1: Her chirpiness brightened up the room with happiness.
meanings.sent2: I love her chirpiness; it always makes me smile.
meanings.sent3: His chirpiness was contagious, spreading joy to everyone around.
meanings.sent4: The chirpiness in her voice was like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The chirpiness of the children playing outside was music to my ears.

meanings.definition: The act of making high-pitched sounds like a bird.
meanings.sent1: The chirpiness of the birds in the morning signaled the start of a new day.
meanings.sent2: I woke up to the chirpiness of the sparrows outside my window.
meanings.sent3: The chirpiness of the robins made it feel like a forest symphony.
meanings.sent4: The chirpiness of the crickets filled the night with their melodious song.
meanings.sent5: The chirpiness of the blue jays added a touch of nature to the urban landscape.
